sentences.en: A bi - directional bending problem for antisymmetrically laminated angle - ply plate is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究反对称斜交叠层板的 双向 弯曲问题.

sentences.en: A type of omni - directional wall - climbing robot which can adapt mutiform well.
sentences.cn: 设计了一种具有适应多种壁面、障能力强、沿任意方向直线移动或在原地旋转任意角度的全方位移动爬壁机器人.

sentences.en: Accordingly, new method can make sure productivity index has clearer directional.
sentences.cn: 因此, 新的方法可以保证生产率指数有更明确的方向性.

sentences.en: An array of wave probes can be used as a directional antenna.
sentences.cn: 排成阵列的测波仪,可作为波浪传播方向的感触器.

sentences.en: Counters can, of course, be made highly directional by the use of external collimation.
sentences.cn: 当然可以利用外部准直法来提高计数器的方向性.

sentences.en: Create a Directional Light and then place It'similar to the image below.
sentences.cn: 建立一盏平行光,如下图所示放置.
碟形卫星天线的定向性非常强。

sentences.en: Established a method to design rod string of heavy oil directional wells.
sentences.cn: 建立了一套适合于稠油定向井的杆管柱设计方法.

sentences.en: In radiocommunications, the radiation in a lobe of a directional antenna.
sentences.cn: 在无线通信技术中, 定向天线以某一波瓣辐射的电磁能.

sentences.en: Jets of compressed air gave the aircraft lateral and directional stability.
sentences.cn: 压缩空气的喷吐使飞机的左右和前后都能保持稳定。

sentences.en: Migrating birds have marvelouos directional sense.
sentences.cn: 候鸟有非凡的方向辨别力。

sentences.en: The development of new products must meet all - directional and multilevel requirements.
sentences.cn: 新产品的开发应该全方位,多层次.

sentences.en: The length of the fuselage was increased due to a degree of directional instability.
sentences.cn: 由于存在某种程度的航向不稳定性，机身被加长了。

sentences.en: The window inevitably imparts directional properties.
sentences.cn: (计数器的)窗不可避免地具有方向性.

sentences.en: Unless he was equipped with a directional microphone, he was out of earshot.
sentences.cn: 除非给他配备一个定向扬声器，否则谁也听不见他。

sentences.en: We will more vigorously promote an omni - directional , multi - level and wide - ranging opening - up pattern .
sentences.cn: 我们将以更积极的姿态推进 全方位 、 多层次、宽领域的 对外开放.
